headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM): Valuation in Focus After Expanded Apiiro Partnership and Earnings Anticipation
summary: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) has seen its stock move higher after unveiling an expanded partnership with Apiiro, a company focused on application security. This development comes as Akamai prepares to report its third quarter earnings. See our latest analysis for Akamai Technologies. Akamai has made headlines with its Apiiro partnership, but the bigger story is the stock’s momentum shift. After a difficult year that saw the share price drop more than 21% and a 12-month total shareholder return...
